Category.Description: Get the Veggies, Taste the Fruit®

Product.Name: Cranberry Blackberry
Product.Description: An invigorating blend of select vegetable juices paired with fruit juices including delicious cranberries and blackberries.

Product.Name: Strawberry Banana
Product.Description: A vibrant blend of select vegetable juices paired with fruit juices including strawberry and banana.

Product.Name: Pomegranate Blueberry
Product.Description: The perfect blend of vegetable juices paired with fruit juices including pomegranate and blueberry.

Product.Name: Peach Mango
Product.Description: A sunny blend of vegetable juices paired with peach, mango and other fruit juices.

Product.Name: Açai Mixed Berry
Product.Description: This delicious blend features the unique flavor of açai (a-sigh-ee), a berry from the Amazon rainforest, blended with other fruit juices including blueberry.

Product.Name: Goji Raspberry
Product.Description: A delicious blend of vegetable juices and fruit juices including raspberries and the trendy flavor of exotic Goji berries.

Product.Name: Passion Fruit Tangerine
Product.Description: A bright blend of vegetable juices and fruit juices including passion fruit and tangerine creates the perfect thirst-quenching juice.

Product.Name: Tropical Orange
Product.Description: A lively blend of vegetable juices paired with pineapple and orange.
